div.style: height: 116px; left: 0; top: 0px; align-items: center; flex-direction: column
display: flex; flex: 1; position: relative; align-items: center; flex-direction: row; margin-top: -5px; align-self: center
display: flex; align-items: center; flex-direction: row; margin-right: 1px; line-height: 26px

label.style: overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis; color: @Color_Black; font-size: 26px; margin-right: 10px; align-self: center

div.style: display: flex; align-items: center; flex-direction: row; overflow: visible

label.style: margin-top: -2px; line-height: 28px; color: @Color_Hue220_L5; font-size: 28px; margin-right: 0px; align-self: center
